attributes.action: Request the BBC do not employ James Allen in any capacity on their 2009 coverage of Formula 1 (F1)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC has just won the broadcast rights for F1 from 2009. James Allen is a commentator for the incumbent ITV Sport. James Allen is annoying, shows an astounding lack of knowledge and is sycophantic towards Lewis Hamilton. Please sign this petition to request the BBC do not waste our licence fee on his wages.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
